name: Dropbop
description:
Platformer - Arcade game where you drop to infinity, evading bombs and other traps while trying to beat the highscore!

This is the desktop version of the complete game - by complete I mean this one will stay as it is without future updates but the android app will receive many updates in the future.

If you enjoy, consider downloading the android version and rating. To search on the Play Store, use 'Dropbopo' instead of it's actual name 'Dropbop'.

Thanks, hope you like playing this little game!
